ValidationRule.description: Proposal Submitted Date is Required if Stage is Proposal Delivered. Stage is set to Proposal Delivered when Proposal Submitted Date or Bid Submit Date is entered, but Stage can be changed manually.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Delivered") , OR ( AND( ISBLANK( Proposal_Submit_Date__c ), RecordType.Name = "Vanguard"), AND( ISBLANK(Bid_Submit_Date__c ), RecordType.Name = "BD MSS")
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bid Submit Date or Proposal Submitted Date is required when Opportunity Stage is Proposal Delivered.
